explanation: [0-0] In a room, there's a metal cotton candy machine with some pink threads on its edge. On the metal countertop, there are some granular objects, with a bottle of pink liquid and a beige plastic bucket on the left. A young man and three children are standing beside the cotton candy machine. Near the edge of the machine are a boy in green and a boy in black, the boy in green holding a bamboo skewer. Behind them stands a girl in red, leaning against a man in a white shirt, looking up. The man in the white shirt on the left has his left hand on the girl's shoulder and his right hand holding a bucket-shaped spoon. The spoon contains some white granular objects. The man is looking down at the cotton candy machine, with a white wall in the background.

[0-10] Then the cotton candy machine starts running, the man in the white shirt pours the white granular objects from the spoon into the hole in the middle of the machine, and then the boy in green skillfully rolls the cotton candy with a bamboo skewer. The white cotton candy threads gradually turn into a fluffy cotton candy ball. The other two children happily watch the cotton candy take shape. Then, more and more cotton candy threads are pulled out, the little boy in green raises his white cotton candy ball high, takes a step back, and the little boy in black squats on the ground, looking up. Then the little boy in black stands up.

[0-10] Then the cotton candy machine starts running, the man in the white shirt pours the white granular objects from the spoon into the hole in the middle of the machine, and then the boy in green skillfully rolls the cotton candy with a bamboo skewer. [10-20] Then the scene changes, now there are only the little boy in black, the little girl in red, and the young man in white left in the room. The little boy in black is holding a bamboo skewer, standing next to the cotton candy machine, and the little girl is leaning against the man in white.
